mapper.select: SELECT REC_ID as "recId", EQUIP_ROOM_CODE as "equipRoomCode", EQUIP_ROOM_NAME as "equipRoomName", SUBJECT_CODE as "subjectCode", SUBJECT_NAME as "subjectName", LINE_CODE as "lineCode", POSITION1_CODE as "position1Code", POSITION1_NAME as "position1Name", POSITION2_CODE as "position2Code", POSITION2_NAME as "position2Name", REMARK as "remark", REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", REC_STATUS as "recStatus", EXT1 as "ext1", EXT2 as "ext2", EXT3 as "ext3", EXT4 as "ext4", EXT5 as "ext5" FROM T_EQUIPMENT_ROOM where REC_ID=#{id}

SELECT COUNT(REC_ID) FROM T_EQUIPMENT_ROOM WHERE EQUIP_ROOM_CODE=#{equipRoomCode} AND LINE_CODE=#{lineCode} AND DELETE_FLAG='0'
AND REC_ID!=#{recId}
SELECT max(EQUIP_ROOM_CODE) FROM T_EQUIPMENT_ROOM where EQUIP_ROOM_CODE like 'F%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_EQUIPMENT_ROOM (REC_ID, EQUIP_ROOM_CODE, EQUIP_ROOM_NAME, SUBJECT_CODE, SUBJECT_NAME, LINE_CODE, POSITION1_CODE, POSITION1_NAME, POSITION2_CODE, POSITION2_NAME, REMARK, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, ARCHIVE_FLAG, REC_STATUS, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5 ) VALUES (#{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipRoomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position1Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position2Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recRevisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recReviseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', #{archiveFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_EQUIPMENT_ROOM SET
EQUIP_ROOM_CODE = #{equipRoomCode},
EQUIP_ROOM_NAME = #{equipRoomName},
SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode},
SUBJECT_NAME = #{subjectName},
LINE_CODE = #{lineCode},
POSITION1_CODE = #{position1Code},
POSITION1_NAME = #{position1Name},
POSITION2_CODE = #{position2Code},
POSITION2_NAME = #{position2Name},
REMARK = #{remark},
ARCHIVE_FLAG = #{archiveFlag},
REC_STATUS = #{recStatus},
EXT1 = #{ext1},
EXT2 = #{ext2},
EXT3 = #{ext3},
EXT4 = #{ext4},
EXT5 = #{ext5},
REC_REVISOR = #{recRevisor}, REC_REVISE_TIME = #{recReviseTime} WHERE REC_ID = #{recId}
